definitions: the quality of being able to be handled or controlled physically

examples.text: a drone offering far greater manipulability than conventional helicopters

shortDefinitions: quality of being able to be handled, controlled, or altered

definitions: the quality of being able to be moved about; flexibility

examples.text: the level of manipulability of our fingers and hands

shortDefinitions: quality of being able to be moved about

definitions: the quality of being able to be influenced or controlled mentally

examples.text: they keep us in a state of manipulability

shortDefinitions: control or influence person or situation cleverly or unscrupulously

definitions: the quality of being able to be altered or edited, particularly so as to mislead
shortDefinitions: quality of being able to be altered or edited
